snippet: It will take constant outside pressure to end the brutality and corruption at the Rikers Island jail.
abstract: Editorial contends Justice Dept is wholly justified in threatening to sue New York City if Mayor Bill de Blasio does not act promptly to improve conditions at Rikers Island jail; calls on federal officials to consider using civil rights statutes to prosecute cases of brutality and misconduct that local authorities have overlooked or declined to bring to court.
lead_paragraph: It will take constant outside pressure to end the brutality and corruption at the Rikers Island jail.

headline.main: New York’s Jails Need Federal Oversight
headline.print_headline: New York’s Jails Need Federal Oversight
